properties.areaDesc: Peoria, IL; Woodford, IL; Tazewell, IL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 13 at 8:09PM CST by NWS Lincoln IL
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Illinois...

Illinois River at Peoria affecting Peoria...Tazewell and Woodford
Counties
Illinois River at Henry affecting Marshall and Putnam Counties
Illinois River near Havana affecting Cass...Fulton and Mason
Counties
Illinois River at Beardstown affecting Brown...Cass...Morgan and
Schuyler Counties

.The following forecasts are based on observed precipitation, soil
moisture conditions, and forecast precipitation.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Illinois River at Peoria.
* From late Tuesday night until further notice.
* At 745 PM Monday the stage was 15.5 feet.
* Flood stage is 18 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by early Wednesday morning and
continue to rise to near 19.6 feet by Friday morning.
* Impact...At 18 feet...Some flooding begins to bottomland not
protected by levees.
properties.instruction:
If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternate
route. Turn around, don't drown.

Additional river and weather information is available at
www.weather.gov/ilx.
